title.a: Hiker Rescue - Interagency Hoist Op 01/08/2023 INC#1009

item.description: Hiker Rescue - Interagency Hoist Op; INC#1009; 04:22PM; 2100 Queensferry Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Zo7waI; Brentwood; Firefighter / Paramedics made their way to an adult male patient who is stable but in serious condition and unable to walk (non-traumatic medical complaint). The terrain/location is not conducive to a safe ground based rescue. LAFD Air Ops was in the process of a hoist/transport of an injured hiker on a separate incident therefore a LA Co Sheriff helicopter was requested. LASD Air 5 is closer than the LAFD hoist helicopter and will conduct the hoist operation supported by LAFD firefighters on the ground and LAFD command helicopter. The 9-1-1 call was received at 3:38PM. No further details.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 BP19 E19 E269 H2 H3 HA2 HA3 RA19 RA69 RH214 T69; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#0953; 03:28PM; 2898 E Observatory Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GRsXtS; Griffith Park; LAFD Air Ops lowered a medic to meet the ground firefighters and assess a 20yo male patient with traumatic injuries sustained in a fall. Due to the injuries and terrain, LAFD Air Ops will conduct a hoist operation and transport the patient. The 9-1-1 call was received at 3:03PM. No further details.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC5 E203 E227 E235 E27 E35 H3 H5 HA3 HA5 HR3 RA27 RA3 RA56 RA803 RA827 RA835 RA844 RH114 T27 T3 T35 UR27 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1237; 06:29PM; 529 W 107th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Zhi6QW; #VermontVista; Twenty-four firefighters quickly responded, located and extinguished the flames inside the one-story home in 15 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E64 E65 RA257 RA64 SQ21 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1237; 06:14PM; 529 W 107th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Zhi6QW; #VermontVista; One-story single family home with moderate smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E64 E65 RA64 SQ21 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0824; 02:09PM; 682 W 13th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GsxKAr; #SanPedro; Twenty firefighters performed a well-coordinated attack on a vacant bungalow to quickly extinguish the flames in 9 minutes, keeping the fire contained to the unit of origin and protecting neighboring structures. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC706 E112 E248 E48 RA112 RA848 T48; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0824; 02:00PM; 682 W 13th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GsxKAr; #SanPedro; One-story row of bungalows with fire showing from one unit. Offensive mode.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC706 E112 E248 E48 RA112 T48; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0677; 12:27PM; 1598 Bienveneda Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ItVCpZ; #PacificPalisades; An adult female suffered a lower leg injury while hiking on or near a remote trail. Firefighters made initial contact by ground, provided initial treatment and support, and moved her to an area suitable for LAFD Air Ops to perform a hoist operation. The patient is now being transported to the hospital by air in fair condition. Nothing further.; FS 69; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 BC9 E23 E269 E69 H3 H5 HA3 HA5 RA23 RH114 T69; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0685; 12:48PM; 4027 W Palmwood Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VV5EDJ; #BaldwinHills/#Crenshaw; Twenty LAFD firefighters managed to extinguish flames in one unit of a two-story garden-style apartment building in just 14 minutes, despite excessive storage conditions inside. There were no reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E215 E226 E266 E34 E66 E68 RA26 RA68 T15 T26; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0685; 12:34PM; 4027 W Palmwood Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VV5EDJ; #BaldwinHills/#Crenshaw; Two-story garden-style apartment building with fire in one unit. Offensive mode.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E215 E226 E266 E34 E66 E68 RA26 RA68 T15 T26; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 01/07/2023 INC#0090

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0090; 02:31AM; 2647 N Pasadena Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jUyI0G; #LincolnHeights; Firefighters arrived to find a vacant two-story multi-family residential structure fully involved with fire. Firefighters engaged in defensive firefighting operations (from the exterior only) with large-diameter hose lines. After knocking back the flames, firefighters transitioned interior to an offensive attack to finish off the hard-to-reach areas and remaining hot spots. It took 45 firefighters 54 minutes to extinguish the flames, while successfully protecting neighboring buildings. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC1 BC2 CM20 CM22 E12 E2 E201 E202 E212 E44 E47 EM1 EM9 RA12 RA2 RA801 T1 T12 T2; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange
